trans-unit.source: Represents a rule that checks for errors that are raised by a data source that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma regra que verifica a existência de erros que são gerados por uma origem de dados que implemente <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] modelo de enlace de dados permite-lhe associar <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>com um <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NotifyDataErrorValidationRule class is a built-in rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the updates of the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: A classe de NotifyDataErrorValidationRule é uma regra incorporada que verifica a existência de exceções forem emitidas durante as atualizações da propriedade da origem de enlace.

trans-unit.source: You can provide custom logic to specify how the binding engine handles these exceptions by using a <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.
trans-unit.target: Pode fornecer a lógica personalizada para especificar a forma como o motor de enlace processa estas exceções, utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>

trans-unit.source: An alternative syntax to setting the NotifyDataErrorValidationRule explicitly is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> property to `true` on your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma sintaxe alternativa para definir explicitamente o NotifyDataErrorValidationRule consiste em definir a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>propriedade `true` no seu <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> is `true`, so you do not need to explicitly use a NotifyDataErrorValidationRule.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>é `true`, por isso não terá a utilizem explicitamente um NotifyDataErrorValidationRule.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom rule by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar uma regra personalizada através da criação de uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For more information and a detailed discussion of data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações e ver um debate detalhado da validação de dados, consulte [descrição geral de enlace de dados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: Executa as verificações de validação num valor.

trans-unit.source: The value (from the binding target) to check.
trans-unit.target: O valor (proveniente do destino de enlace) para verificar.

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: A cultura a utilizar esta regra.
